ERROR.UNKNOWN: Sorry, an error occured while performing the requested operation.
ERROR.BAD_REQUEST: An error occured while performing the requested operation
ERROR.NOT_FOUND: The resource you are trying to access does not exist
ERROR.UNAUTHORIZED: You should sign in in order to perform the requested operation.
ERROR.FORBIDDEN: You are not allowed to perform the requested operation
ERROR.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: Sorry, an unexpected error occured while performing the requested operation.

TENANT-MGMT.NO-SELECTION: Select a tenant from the list on the left
TENANT-MGMT.LOGO: The users of this tenant will see the following header. Click on it to change the logo.
TENANT-MGMT.ALFRESCO-REPO-SUB-TITLE: Configure your on premise Corelate repositories
TENANT-MGMT.ALFRESCO-VERSION-HELP: Select the version of your Corelate repository.
TENANT-MGMT.ALFRESCO-VERSION-HELP-40: You are using an Corelate version that requires the 'Corelate tenant' field above to be explicitly filled in. You can find the value for the tenant field by visiting the Corelate Share's 'Admin Console' and navigate to 'Repository > Repository Descriptor (Current)' and copy the value for 'Id'.
TENANT-MGMT.ALFRESCO-VERSION-HELP-40-ADMIN-CONSOLE-L: Click the link below to visit the 'Admin Console'
TENANT-MGMT.ALFRESCO-REPO-TENANT-HELP: Tenant name to use in Corelate. When omitted, the default tenant (-default-) is assumed
TENANT-MGMT.ALFRESCO-REPO-URL-HELP: Base URL for Corelate repository install, for example: https://my-domain.com/corelate
TENANT-MGMT.ALFRESCO-REPO-SHARE-URL-HELP: Base URL for Corelate share install, for example: https://my-domain.com/share. Used to generate links to view content in an Corelate repository.
TENANT-MGMT.ALFRESCO-REPO-SHARE-CONNECTOR-HELP: Select if you are using the Corelate Share connector
TENANT-MGMT.ALFRESCO-REPO-SECRET-HELP: Specify if using the Corelate Share connector. Will allow Workflow Designer to communicate with Corelate without creating Corelate user accounts in Workflow Designer for each user.
TENANT-MGMT.ALFRESCO-REPO-NONE: No Corelate repositories configured for this tenant.

POPUP.CREATE-MAX-USERS: Maximum allowed users in this tenant
POPUP.DELETE-TITLE: Are you sure you want to remove this tenant?
POPUP.DELETE-DESCRIPTION: When this tenant is deleted, all of its groups are removed too. All the users belonging to this tenant will be changed to have no tenant.

POPUP.ALFRESCO-REPO-DELETE-MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete the Corelate Repository {{name}}? Existing content from the repository will still be available but no new content can be linked or imported using this repository.

EVENT.LAST-NAME-CHANGE: User "{{userName}}" has changed email address: from "{{originalLastName}}" to "{{newLastName}}"

SYSTEM-GROUP-MGMT.NO-SELECTION: Select a group from the list on the left
SYSTEM-GROUP-MGMT.NO-CAPABILITIES: No capabilities set for this group

SYSTEM-GROUP-MGMT.CAPABILITIES-ADDED: Capabilities have been successfully added to group

POPUP.DELETE-DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete this group? This will delete all sub groups too.
POPUP.DELETE-MEMBER-DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete "{{userToRemove.firstName}} {{userToRemove.lastName}}" from the group?
POPUP.DELETE-CAPABILITY-DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete this capablity from the group?

FUNCTIONAL-GROUP-MGMT.NO-SELECTION: Select a group from the list on the left
FUNCTIONAL-GROUP-MGMT.USER-ADDED: Users have been added to group
FUNCTIONAL-GROUP-MGMT.INACTIVE-DESCRIPTION: This group has been deactivated. Users will still be able complete currently assigned tasks to this group, but new process definitions cannot use this group anymore.

POPUP.DELETE-DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete this deactivated group? This will delete all sub groups and new task assigned to this group or its subgroups will not be able be found using the regular search filters.
POPUP.DEACTIVATE-DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete this group? This will delete all sub groups too. Note that a group will first be deactivated, such that tasks of processes can be properly finished. Clicking the removal button a second time will delete the group completely.
POPUP.DELETE-MEMBER-DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete "{{userToRemove.fullname}}" from the group?
POPUP.ACTIVATE-DESCRIPTION: Activate this group again? This means that this group would again be eligble for task assignment. Note that subgroups of a group are not activated by default.
